attributes.action: recognise the monopoly in the investment banking sector and act to limit fee percentages.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a monopoly operating in the investment banking sector - leading to excessive fee percentages, profits and thus staff bonuses. The government and the fsa should recognise this monopoly and act to limit the fee percentages for the good of the wealth creating economy and the wider population. Do you agree with me
